name: type_of
description: An importable TypeScript / JavaScript method to fix the JavaScript **typeof** operator. This code is written as a module for the **deno** runtime. If you are using JavaScript with node.js there is also an included [type_of.mjs](./src/type_of.mjs) file you can download. If you would like to visit the deno.land module page for **type_of()** [type_of deno module](https://deno.land/x/type_of).
